dialogue.text: I apologize for the sudden interruption.
I was just so eager to at least get one more song in.
You never remember seeing this pristine visage before you? How upsetting. . .
Either way, ever since I’ve heard of you, I’ve been looking through your “journey” through the wide multitude of people you fought!
Every one of them is interesting in their tactics, personality, and most importantly for this case, their music!
My request? Well I’ll start singing first, you should be able to catch on soon enough~ I won’t be going easy on you though dearie
Although last time I told you to give it your all, I mean that to a much higher degree.
And no worries, none of this is canon to the unknowing wanderers who're worried about such a plot twist~~!
Anyways now with that all out of the way, let’s begin shall we?
I wonder how many times you’ll get blue balled? Or will you 1cc this?
